title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Skills: Mobile-Based Business Language Microlearning Course

context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately utilize core language expressions required in workplace situations with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners complete microlearning content (15-minute units, 5 times per week) via a mobile platform with at least 90% completion rate.
Learners share at least three real-life language application cases using mobile collaboration tools with peer learners.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
